test_message: Analyze my bank transactions: Netflix $15.99 charged twice on Jan 15, Whole Foods $450 on Jan 10, Rent $2000 on Jan 1, Salary deposit $6000 on Jan 5, Gas $80 on Jan 12, Spotify $9.99 unused for 45 days. Calculate my burn rate and identify surplus capital.

anomalies.description: Duplicate Netflix charge detected on Jan 15 (2 charges of $15.99 within 48 hours)
Spotify subscription of $9.99 appears unused for 45 days. Consider cancelling.
